content.text:
# 1880 Windsor colonial by-election

A by-election was held for the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorate of Windsor on 29 July 1880 because Richard Driver died.
Dates
{| class="wikitable"
! Date !! Event
|-
| 8 July 1880
| Richard Driver died.
|-
| 9 July 1880
| Writ of election issued by the Speaker of the Legislative Assembly.
|-
| 27 July 1880
| Nominations
|-
| 29 July 1880
| Polling day
|-
| 3 August 1880
| Return of writ
|}
Result
}}
Richard Driver died.

*Electoral results for the district of Windsor
*List of New South Wales state by-elections
